item.description: The third season of “Jujutsu Kaisen” will premiere in January 2026, Crunchyroll revealed during a live-streamed fifth anniversary special for the Crunchyroll Anime Award-winning series. Cr

item.title: Box Office: ‘Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle’ Smashes Opening Records in Japan with $49.4M Debut
item.description: ‘Infinity Castle’ surpassed the opening weekend of all-time anime champ ‘Demon Slater: Mugen Train’, fueling hopes that the new installment could also set global records when it opens in North America
